prTitle: feat: implement care guide template with semantic structure and accessibility
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented the care guide template (`care-guide.html`) for issue #20 with comprehensive semantic HTML structure, responsive design, and full accessibility support.

### Features Implemented

**Core Template Structure:**
- Complete care guide template extending base layout
- Semantic HTML5 elements (`<article>`, `<section>`, `<aside>`, `<nav>`)
- Two-column responsive layout (sidebar + main content)
- Breadcrumb navigation with proper ARIA labels

**Table of Contents:**
- Sticky sidebar navigation with section links
- Supports nested subsections (h2/h3 hierarchy)
- Mobile-responsive with collapsible behavior
- JavaScript-enhanced with active section highlighting
- Smooth scrolling and reading progress indicator

**Content Organization:**
- Definition lists (`<dl>`) for care items and key information
- Info boxes for tips, warnings, and important callouts
- Support for images with `<figure>` and responsive srcset
- Related topics and additional resources sections

**Navigation Components:**
- Prev/next navigation between care guide pages
- "Back to overview" link for easy navigation
- Proper `rel` attributes for SEO and accessibility

**Accessibility Features:**
- Complete ARIA labels and landmarks
- Semantic heading hierarchy (h1 > h2 > h3)
- Skip links for keyboard navigation
- Screen reader optimizations
- High contrast and print media support

**Responsive Design:**
- Mobile-first CSS with breakpoints at 768px and 480px
- Flexible grid layout that adapts to screen size
- Touch-friendly navigation on mobile devices
- Optimized typography scales

**Interactive Elements:**
- Warning boxes with `role="alert"` for important safety information
- Collapsible TOC on mobile devices
- JavaScript enhancements for better UX

### Files Created

- `src/templates/base.html` - Base template with header/footer
- `src/templates/care-guide.html` - Main care guide template
- `src/styles/components/care-guide.css` - Primary template styles
- `src/styles/components/definition-lists.css` - Styles for care item lists
- `src/styles/components/table-of-contents.css` - TOC navigation styles
- `src/styles/components/info-boxes.css` - Warning/tip box components
- `src/scripts/table-of-contents.js` - Interactive TOC functionality
- `src/content/care/feeding.md` - Sample content structure
- `example-feeding-guide.html` - Working demo of rendered template

### Template Usage

The template supports all 4 care guide pages:
- `/care/feeding.html` - Feeding guide and nutrition information
- `/care/grooming.html` - Grooming techniques and maintenance
- `/care/housing.html` - Housing and shelter requirements
- `/care/health.html` - Health care and veterinary information

### Technical Details

**Data Structure:**
The template expects content with sections, subsections, care items, tips, and warnings. See `src/content/care/feeding.md` for the complete data schema.

**CSS Architecture:**
Modular CSS components for maintainability, with consistent naming conventions and responsive design patterns.

**JavaScript Enhancement:**
Progressive enhancement with vanilla JavaScript for TOC functionality, no external dependencies required.

**Performance Optimizations:**
- Semantic HTML reduces markup bloat
- Efficient CSS with minimal specificity
- Lazy loading support for images
- Print-optimized styles

### Validation

✅ Semantic HTML5 structure with proper elements
✅ Definition lists for care items as specified
✅ Table of contents with section navigation
✅ Breadcrumb navigation implemented
✅ Prev/next navigation with rel attributes
✅ ARIA labels and accessibility compliance
✅ Info boxes using `<aside>` elements with roles
✅ Responsive design for mobile/desktop
✅ Support for all 4 care guide sections
✅ Extensible template structure

Closes #20
